entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (loveday_disillusion_love_note.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_10: Greetings, Mr. Love told me to expect you. I appreciate your help. You see, I am trying to find a way to let the woman I love know how much she means to me. I haven't been able to. I'm so close, but not quite there. Can you help me?
entries.s_16: This is amazing! You have such a way with words. I'd never have been able to complete this without you! Thank you!!
entries.s_18: Thank you! I've been trying to write her a love letter, but I'm stuck. I can't complete some of the phrases. I need you to help me find the words to complete what I'm trying to say. Are you ready to help me?
entries.s_21: Okay, I'll show you the phrase on which I'm stuck one at a time. Help me complete them.
entries.s_25: Speak with me again when you're ready.
entries.s_26: Speak with me again when you're ready.
entries.s_28: I just can't find the words to express my love to my beloved.
entries.s_5: Are you ready to help me with my love letter?
